# Shiny App Experiment Lab

### Libraries

```{r}
library(here)
library(dplyr)
library(arrow)
```

### Reading data

```{r}
census_data <- open_dataset(here("data", "processed", "parquet_data_coords"))$data
census_data
```

```{r}
census_data
```

```{r}
census_dataset <- open_dataset(here("data", "processed", "parquet_data_coords"))
census_dataset

```

### Reading specific data

```{r}
pueb_norm <- census_dataset |>
    filter(NOM_ENT=="Puebla") |> 
    collect()

pueb_norm
```

unique(pueb_norm$NOM_MUN)
